title: Can Reasoning be activated during the turn the effect of Virtual World Hime - Nyannyan that Special Summons itself was used?
question: I activated the effect of Virtual World Hime - Nyannyan and Special Summoned itself. Can I later activate Reasoning this turn?
answer:
You can still activate Reasoning in this situation.

After you used the effect of Virtual World Hime - Nyannyan that Special Summons itself, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters. If you excavate a Level 2 or lower monster with the effect of Reasoning in this situation, it cannot be Special Summoned and it will be sent to the Graveyard with the other excavated cards.
llm_answer:
**Answer**: No, you cannot activate **Reasoning** this turn.

**Explanation**: When **Virtual World Hime - Nyannyan** is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, its effect restricts you to only Special Summon Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters for the rest of the turn. Since **Reasoning** has an effect that can Special Summon any monster that is excavated, it does not specifically limit itself to summoning monsters of Level 3 or higher. Therefore, you are not allowed to activate **Reasoning** this turn due to the restriction imposed by **Virtual World Hime - Nyannyan**'s effect.
